price: Bagi mereka azab dalam kehidupan dunia dan sesungguhnya azab akhirat adalah lebih keras dan tak ada bagi mereka seorang pelindung pun dari (azab) Allah.
arabic: لَّهُمۡ عَذَابٞ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَقُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahum ʿadhābun fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaqqu wamā lahum mina al-lahi min wāqin
